parameters.query:
SELECT vat_id, company_name, branch, address
FROM global.vat_companies
WHERE vat_id = $1
  AND branch = $2
LIMIT 1;

SELECT vat_id, company_name, branch, address
FROM global.vat_companies
WHERE vat_id = $1
  AND branch = $2
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
    vat_id,
    company_name,
    branch,
    address
FROM PUBLIC.vat_companies
WHERE vat_id = $1
  AND branch = $2
LIMIT 1;
